name: Contrelement
description:
Contrelement is an elemental based tower defense game made in 3 days for the Geta Game Jam 9!

Hardmode Challenge Completed :  All sound effects were recorded with our own mics and voices as per the hardmode challenge. 

Introduction

Contrelement is an elemental based tower defense game made in 3 days for the Geta Game Jam 9! The theme for this game jam was "Contrasting Elements". 

The goal is to protect yourself from the incoming enemies using your minions! Spawn the minions of the opposing element to have advantage in battle! Destroy all of the enemy spawning portals to complete the level!

Controls Rotate playerMouse PointerSpawn minionLeft Mouse Button
Blast wave (clear channel)
Right Mouse Button
Change selected elementMouse Scroll Wheel / 1,2,3
Developers

Developed by team Backyard Giant, a group of Game Development students!  Check them out through the links below!
